Identification_Area.title: HASSELBLAD 70MM STEREO CAMERA SYSTEM for FEXP

Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Instrument_PDS3.instrument_desc:
INSTRUMENT: HASSELBLAD 70MM STEREO CAMERA SYSTEM HOST: FIELD EXPERIMENT
Instrument Information ====================== Instrument Id : HSTP Instrument Host Id : FEXP Pi Pds User Id : TFARR Instrument Name : HASSELBLAD 70MM STEREO CAMERA SYSTEM Instrument Type : FRAMING CAMERA
Instrument Description ====================== Sites were photographed via helicopter-borne 70 mm stereophotography using the JPL Hasselblad system. The images were made with color film (Kodak Aerochrome 2448 color reversal film). The data is then reduced to vertical profiles.
Science Objectives ================== To acquire stereo photography used in compiling topographic profiles.
Operational Considerations ========================== Not Applicable
Calibration Description ======================= Not Applicable
Section 'HSTP' ==============
In modes -------- OPERATING
'HSTP' Section Parameter 'RADIANCE' ----------------------------------- Radiance is the amount of energy per time per projected area per steradian.
Instrument Parameter Name : RADIANCE
Description ----------- Not Applicable
Sensitivity ----------- Not Applicable
Instrument Mode 'OPERATING' ===========================
In sections ----------- HSTP
Description ----------- Not Applicable
